Headline: Red Line Service Delayed at 47th
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at 47th due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include #29 State buses to provide connecting Northbound and Southbound service.

Also, shuttle buses have been requested from Roosevelt to 95th/Dan Ryan, in both directions, to provide connecting service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
